headline: Is Hershey Stock Still Attractive After Its Recent Share Price Climb in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Hershey at around $188 a share is still a sweet deal or if most of the value has already been eaten up? You are not alone. That is exactly what we are going to unpack. After a choppy few years, the stock has quietly climbed, up about 4.1% over the last week, 5.0% over the past month, 11.4% year to date, and 9.0% over the last year, even though the 3 year return is still negative at -13.2% versus a stronger 41.6% over five years. Recently, investors have been weighing Hershey's...
